item.title: Report E-2025040085
item.description:
Report E-2025040085

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-03
  • City: CHINA GROVE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 2, 2025, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN1866 was punctured and released less than one (<1) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Carolina Environmental Response Team (CERT) to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the trailer. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum and the damaged drum was placed in one (1) 95-gallon overpack,
